content: Volare Network ROUND 2 Bounty campaign has officially ended.Spreadsheet will be finalized by the bounty manager and rewards will be distributed right after.   [WEBSITE]   [TELEGRAM]   [TWITTER]   [MEDIUM]   [WALLET]   [REDDIT]   [ANN THREAD]   [VOLRSCAN]   Disclaimer: I am only the Bounty Campaign Manager for this project.
